nodes.bodyText: We do not know whether that workaround fixes the problem. We do not know why it is running out of memory. There could be a memory leak, so it would only be a question of time until we do run out of memory.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -79,6 +79,14 @@ No bug fixes with [user impact in this release](https://wiki.hyperledger.org/dis
 
 Known issues are open issues categorized as [Very High or High impact](https://wiki.hyperledger.org/display/BESU/Defect+Prioritisation+Policy).
 
+#### New known issues 
+
+- K8S permissioning uses of Service IPs rather than pod IPs which can fail. [\#1190](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/1190)
+Workaround - Do not use permissioning on K8S. 
+
+- Restart caused by insufficient memory can cause inconsistent private state. [\#1110](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/1110) 
+Workaround - Ensure you allocate enough memory for the Java Runtime Environment that the node does not run out of memory.
